reviews.review: Visually stunning! Great story and world expansion that has grown with the characters and the audience. Soundtrack is absolutely amazing. See it on the big screen!
Great movie gotta love frozen and that awesome snowman A+++
Better than the first in my opinion!

After recently rewatching the first I realized that it wasn't quite as great as I remembered it being when I watched it 6 years ago. The sequel though was amazing in so many ways! The songs were beautiful, the animation was stunning, and the movie as a whole was just really great! Sure some aspects of the storyline were a little bit repetitive, but I can forgive that because the rest of the movie was so great!

Even though the much talked about songs don't quite live up to the one(s) from Frozen 1 (that said they are still pretty nice!!!), this movie is huge fun, adventure, it's thrilling and has some incredibly cute moments combined with a story that answers open questions from Frozen 1 very well.
Just GO watch it! :)
Finally we know where Elsa came from! Such a great background!
it wasn't great but it also wasn't torture. I ended up being entertained by the kidos in the theater giving their parents hell because they lost interest in the movie quickly. Now THAT was funny!
I really enjoyed Frozen2, my daughter and I had a wonderful time!
Very good movie. My 6 year old daughter and I both loved it.

(Quick review)

Frozen 2 is a 2019 sequel to the 2013 hit Disney film Frozen. The film was directed by Jennifer Lee and Chris Buck, and stars Idina Menzel as Elsa and Kristen Bell as Anna.

An at times beautifully animated film that sadly suffers from a lacklustre story with one of the most infuriating endings that I've seen in an animated Disney film as of this time. The voice cast was strong, the characters were uninteresting and at times just dated caricatures, the animation was, for the most part, stunning, but unfortunately, the story really let down the film and made it nearly unbearable to sit through.

Overall I give it a 
3/10 - not good, wouldn't recommend
